Title: Secure AppSettings endpoints
Description: Require JWT + Admin role for AppSettingsController; stop binding Domain entity directly (use DTOs).
AcceptanceCriteria: Unauthenticated requests return 401; non-admin returns 403; CRUD uses DTOs; Swagger bearer works.

Title: Add Admin role baseline
Description: Create Admin role wiring for future admin endpoints (authorization via [Authorize(Roles=\Admin\")])."
AcceptanceCriteria: Admin role can be enforced on controllers/actions; dev seeding can create Admin role/user.

Title: Standardize API error handling (ProblemDetails)
Description: Add global exception handler + consistent ProblemDetails responses; unify 400/401/403/404 patterns.
AcceptanceCriteria: Errors return RFC7807 with stable shape; no raw exception messages in production.

Title: Unify question/deck data source
Description: Currently there is SQL-backed study/decks and an embedded JSON question bank for /api/questions. Pick one source-of-truth (recommend SQL) and refactor endpoints accordingly.
AcceptanceCriteria: Decks/questions/study endpoints use one consistent source; IDs match across endpoints and UI.

Title: Fix userId claim extraction consistency
Description: Standardize JWT claim mapping for user id so all controllers parse user id the same way.
AcceptanceCriteria: All authorized endpoints derive userId reliably; no Unauthorized caused by missing claim mapping.

Title: Add request validation for public endpoints
Description: Validate public payloads via DataAnnotations and return ValidationProblemDetails (field-level errors).
AcceptanceCriteria: Invalid payload returns 400 with field-level errors in ValidationProblemDetails.

Title: Improve UI error display
Description: UI parses ProblemDetails/ValidationProblemDetails and shows general + field-level errors consistently.
AcceptanceCriteria: Login/Register/Settings/Study/Onboarding show readable errors with field highlights.

Title: Add onboarding route guard
Description: Route guard: authenticated but not onboarded is forced to /onboarding; prevent accessing study/settings.
AcceptanceCriteria: User cannot access protected pages before onboarding; authenticated users redirected away from login/register.

Title: Align onboarding with UserSettings domain
Description: Full settings saved during onboarding (FontScale/AudioSpeed/Focus/SilentMode + Language/DailyGoalMinutes).
AcceptanceCriteria: Onboarding collects and persists full settings; Settings page edits same fields; values survive refresh.

Title: Remove dev DB connection printing
Description: Replace Console.WriteLine of SQL connection target/user with ILogger and redact secrets; ensure non-dev prints nothing.
AcceptanceCriteria: No connection user/password printed to console; logs are structured.

Title: Fix nullability warning in StudyController
Description: Normalize null strings when mapping DB question -> Shared contracts to remove CS8604 warning.
AcceptanceCriteria: Solution builds with 0 warnings.

Title: Add docker-compose for SQL Server
Description: Add docker-compose.sqlserver.yml for local SQL Server and document in local config.
AcceptanceCriteria: docker compose starts DB; docs updated.

Title: Add readiness/health endpoint
Description: Add health/readiness endpoint including DB connectivity check.
AcceptanceCriteria: /health/ready includes DB check; returns unhealthy when DB is down.

Title: Request logging + correlation id
Description: Add middleware for request logging; include correlation id header + logging scope.
AcceptanceCriteria: Logs include correlation id, route, status, latency.

Title: Rate limit auth endpoints
Description: Apply basic rate limiting to login/register endpoints.
AcceptanceCriteria: Repeated login attempts are throttled; legitimate use still works.

Title: CORS production configuration
Description: Document and enforce Cors:AllowedOrigins for non-development.
AcceptanceCriteria: Non-dev rejects unknown origins; docs show how to configure.

Title: Refactor controllers to use Application services
Description: Reduce direct EF usage in controllers by introducing Application interfaces for study/decks queries.
AcceptanceCriteria: Controllers become thin; data access centralized.

Title: Optimize next-question selection
Description: Avoid COUNT+Skip approach for large tables; implement more scalable selection strategy.
AcceptanceCriteria: Next question remains performant with large deck sizes.

Title: Add paging for deck questions list
Description: Expose paged list endpoint for questions by deck.
AcceptanceCriteria: Endpoint supports page/pageSize and returns stable ordering.

Title: WorkerService meaningful job skeleton
Description: Replace heartbeat loop with a real job skeleton (config, DI scope, error handling).
AcceptanceCriteria: Worker runs with scoped services; errors are logged; graceful shutdown works.

Title: Unit tests: JwtTokenService
Description: Add unit tests for JWT token creation (claims, expiry).
AcceptanceCriteria: Tests validate required claims and expiry window.

Title: Integration tests: auth flow
Description: Integration tests for register/login + authorized endpoint.
AcceptanceCriteria: Tests pass against test SQL Server.

Title: Integration tests: study flow
Description: Integration tests for decks->next->answer->today.
AcceptanceCriteria: Tests pass end-to-end (in-memory test host).

Title: Add CI pipeline (build + test)
Description: Add CI (GitHub Actions/Azure DevOps) for restore/build/test.
AcceptanceCriteria: PR checks run and block merges on failure.

Title: Add formatting/analyzers enforcement in CI
Description: Enforce dotnet format/analyzers in CI.
AcceptanceCriteria: CI fails on formatting or analyzer violations.

Title: Consolidate documentation under docs
Description: Make /docs the single source of truth; replace root duplicates with stubs/pointers.
AcceptanceCriteria: All project documents live in /docs; root files (if present) only point to /docs.

Title: Apply FontScale to global UI typography
Description: Use stored FontScale (Medium/Large/XLarge) to scale base font sizes (CSS variables/root) for elderly readability.
AcceptanceCriteria: Changing FontScale in Settings affects typography across pages after refresh; no layout overflow regressions.

Title: Use Focus setting to suggest/default deck
Description: Use StudyFocus to preselect relevant deck(s) or add a “Recommended” filter.
AcceptanceCriteria: When Focus=Reading/Writing/Civics, Study opens with a matching deck selected by default (fallback to first deck).

Title: Wire AudioSpeed and SilentMode into future TTS/audio
Description: When TTS/audio is implemented, respect AudioSpeed and SilentMode for playback behavior.
AcceptanceCriteria: SilentMode disables auto-audio; AudioSpeed affects playback speed; settings persist.

Title: Integration tests for validation errors
Description: Add tests that send invalid payloads to login/register/settings(full) and assert ValidationProblemDetails shape.
AcceptanceCriteria: Tests verify 400 + field errors keys match DTO property names.

Title: Deprecate or remove MVP /api/me/settings endpoint
Description: Once all clients use /api/me/settings/full, either deprecate or remove the MVP endpoint to reduce duplication.
AcceptanceCriteria: No UI pages call the MVP endpoint; docs updated; endpoint removed or marked obsolete.
